SELECT e.empno eno, e.ename name, e.job, e.hiredate, e.sal, NVL(TO_CHAR(e.comm), '커미션 없음') comm, dname, loc, grade, NVL(s.ename, '상사없음') sangsa FROM emp e, emp s, dept d, salgrade WHERE e.deptno = d.deptno AND e.mgr = s.empno(+) AND e.sal BETWEEN losal AND hisal AND e.empno = #{eno}
